text: Ara yakhana tomara palanakarta bani adamera prstadesa theke bera karalena tadera santanaderake ebam nijera upara taderake pratijna karalena, ami ki tomadera palanakarta na'i? Tara balala, abasya'i, amara angikara karachi. Abara na keyamatera dina balate suru kara ye, e bisayati amadera jana chila na.
